column3: UPDATE:  TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75S IN FAYETTE CO:
column4: The right and middle lanes are closed at the 112.4 MM (just south of Paris Pike) until further notice due to a collision involving a jackknifed semi.
W Third St between N Upper St and N Mill St
column5: The roadway is shut down in both directions.

column4: Old Richmond Rd near Delong Rd.

column5: Three semis unable to go under the RR bridge.
